short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickCalc - A simple calculator for your Chrome Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly perform basic calculations right in your browser!

Features:
-Basic mathematical functions (addition, subtraction, division, multiplication)
-A clean and elegant design
-Enter values with your keyboard or through the simple interface
-Completely free and ad free

If you like QuickCalc please give us a rating!
